title: Client playing EDM music...
body: Not sure how its happening? Thought it was someone on Skype playing music but I checked my sound panel and its coming from League. I don't mind, but how do I turn this on and off?

replies.body:
That's really strange. Unless one of the youtube videos from the Client's home page is playing, you shouldn't hear any dope tracks. D:

Can you restart your client and let me know if this happens again?

Sorry for the late reply - when I logged back into my client, it didn't happen again. 

My computer's sound menu said the music was coming from my league client, and it continued into my match. My roommate said it sounded like the music that was being played on some kind of "League of Music" stream? 

Let me know if you figure out a way to bring it back, ha!

I haven't been able to figure out if this was a one-off or an actual feature. If I find out more, I'll be sure to let you know. If you were interested, a lot of the sweet tracks used during the LCS streams can be found on youtube. :D

Let me know if you have any other questions.
It was almost definitely DJ Sona.
I'm vaguely familIar with her 3 soundtracks, this wasn't them. And she wasn't in my game.
